::DarkMouse::

She looked up and saw Quickstrik standing against the wall.  She ran 
over to him. "Commander, in your condition, you should be laying down 
and resting.  That drug I gave you will take affect and you'll in no 
condition to do much.  Please lay back down." She stood next to him.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> Quickstrike listened on to the heated argument between Dark Mouse 
and 
> Phobia. It sounded serious, and it could lead to a dangerous 
situation for 
> all of them. He slowly go up and stumbled to the side of the mouth 
of the 
> cave.
> 
> "What's goin' on?" he mumbled, leaning against a wall.
>
